EmailTemplate.name: ACC_CRM_Global Account Closed to New Business
EmailTemplate.subject: The Global Account for {!Opportunity.Name} {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} entered is closed to new business by Finance
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Global Account for the {!Opportunity.Name} entered is closed to new business by Finance and cannot be advanced nor contracted with at this time. Please contact your local BU Credit Control/Finance lead for information on this account.
